item.title: SAPOL Social Media Campaign
item.dc:creator: harry
item.description: For a university group project, we were required to create a social media campaign for a client. The client my group and I were assigned to was the South Australian Police. The campaign we were asked to create was to either re-invent their current Party Safe campaign or to create our own version using the …
item.content:encoded:
For a university group project, we were required to create a social media campaign for a client. The client my group and I were assigned to was the South Australian Police.

The campaign we were asked to create was to either re-invent their current Party Safe campaign or to create our own version using the original as a scaffold. My group and I decided to create a hashtag on Instagram and create a website to showcase the photos.

My role for this project was to create the website.

I used an already made, royalty-free Bootstrap template as a scaffold and edited the website using HTML and CSS. I also used other external HTML, CSS and JavaScript scripts to provide extra functionality, for example; the comparative image slider. I also used other online software on the website, for example; I used an online service called Juicer to display the Instagram images on the website.

Grade for this Assignment: HD
Final Subject Grade: HD

item.title: Website & Promotional Video
item.dc:creator: harry
item.description: For my university assignment, I created a website and a promotional video for a fictional technology store. I was provided with a responsive website template and had to tailor the website to my fictional technology store using HTML and CSS. I used Adobe Photoshop to create the website header and Final Cut Pro X to …
item.content:encoded:
For my university assignment, I created a website and a promotional video for a fictional technology store.

I was provided with a responsive website template and had to tailor the website to my fictional technology store using HTML and CSS.

I used Adobe Photoshop to create the website header and Final Cut Pro X to edit the video. I also used GarageBand to produce the music.

Grades:
Part 1: Creative Journal – P2
Part 2: Promotional Video – C
Part 3: Online Presentation (Website) – D
Final Subject Grade: C

item.title: Suzanne Collins (Author) Website
item.dc:creator: harry
item.description: For my university assignment, I was asked to find a poorly designed website and improve the design. The website that I chose to improve was the website for Suzanne Collins, author of The Hunger Games trilogy. This website was built using ASP.NET, HTML, CSS, JavaScript and Bootstrap. Because the website’s original extension (.aspx) would not …
item.content:encoded:
For my university assignment, I was asked to find a poorly designed website and improve the design. The website that I chose to improve was the website for Suzanne Collins, author of The Hunger Games trilogy.

This website was built using ASP.NET, HTML, CSS, JavaScript and Bootstrap.

Because the website’s original extension (.aspx) would not upload online, I had to re-save the website with .html, therefore some of the website’s features may not work.

This website is also best viewed using Google Chrome.

Grade for this Assignment: D
Final Subject Grade: C
